entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Guysborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Tracadie 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: NNE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then northeast 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
